name: gloat
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to feel or express great pleasure or satisfaction because of your own success or good luck, or someone else's failure or bad luck: gloat over/about She's continually gloating over/about her new job. I know I shouldn't gloat, but it really serves him right.gloat at His enemies were quick to gloat at his humiliation. [ + speech ] "This is our fourth victory in a row," he gloated.
